Frequently Asked Questions

Is it really free?

Yes! The free plan includes unlimited calculations with no sign-up required. You only pay if you want Pro features like saving history and PDF exports.

Can I cancel anytime?

Absolutely. There are no contracts or commitments. Cancel your Pro subscription anytime with just one click.

Is my data safe?

Yes. All calculations happen in your browser. We don't store any of your financial data unless you explicitly save it with a Pro account.

Ready to know your real earnings?

Start calculating your take-home pay for free. No sign-up required.
